column1: Comment
The customer service at GizmoTech is abysmal. No one ever picks up the phone.
Received a faulty product. GizmoTech's quality control is a joke.
Website crashes constantly. GizmoTech needs better developers.
Overpriced junk! GizmoTech's products are not worth the money.
Rude staff at GizmoTech's store. Avoid shopping there.

Billing errors galore! GizmoTech can't get their invoices right.
